thread.section_title: Avas Flowers Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Avas Flowers | avasflowers.com
thread.title: Kristin Smits
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Kristin Smits

author: Kristin Smits
title: Kristin Smits
text: I purchased a funeral arrangement from Avas Flowers this past week. I am always skeptical when purchasing flowers from an out of town florist. I went with Avas on a whim and could not have been happier. The flowers surpassed my expectations. The blooms were large, bright and beautiful. This is one place that I wish I could use more often knowing the service that they provided. Thank you for taking time to make a beautiful bouquet. You did not disappoint!!
